name: microservice-registry
description: A backend service that hosts meta information about existing microservices.

scripts.build: docker build -t microservice-registry:1.0.0 . && docker rmi -f $(docker images --filter 'dangling=true' -q) 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.test: npm run build && docker-compose -f src/spec/support/docker/docker-compose.yml up && docker-compose -f src/spec/support/docker/docker-compose.yml down

author: Juan J. San Emeterio
